translated: Having entered like this, it appears in the form of a vajra maṇi jewel from the heart of that Tathāgata, with vast light universally illuminating all worlds. Having universally conferred empowerment upon all sentient beings with the method of empowerment of all Tathāgatas, it gathers back into one body, and the light revolves and enters the heart of the greatly virtuous Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva. Then, it appears from the heart of Ākāśagarbha Bodhisattva-Mahāsattva as the greatly virtuous Vajrapāṇi, with a body that is universally adorned with a blazing treasury of light, with the adornments of various-colored vajra maṇi jewels, empowerment jewels, and so forth, holding the great vajra pure maṇi jewel banner mudrā.
